editionStmt.edition: Digital Edition in Wylie with TEI Markup

licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) licence applies to this document.

projectDesc.p: This document was created and is made available in the framework of the ERC project “The Dawn of Tibetan Buddhist Scholasticism (11th-13th c.) (TibSchol). This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement No. 101001002). See https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/101001002

prefixDef.p: In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "db" prefix point to the project's APIS instance, a database system to collect information of entities.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "per" prefix point to the BDRC's data interface's person module.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "zot" prefix point to a record in the projects's Zotero group.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "corpusmd" prefix point to any element in the corpus TEI document via its ID.

body.ab:
bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi lus mdzes par byed pa| legs bshed rin po che'i tshoms bzhugs lags so|| e ma ho||
theg pa chen po'i sa dang lam gyi rim pa shin tu gsal zhing × mgo bde bar bshed pa lags s+ho|| maNGgalaM|

bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi lus mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan legs par bshad pa rin po che'i tshoms bsgrigs pa
'di ni| lung gi sbyor ba mang po dang | 'dod lugs sna tshogs dang | dgag sgrub kyi rtsod lan mang po bris na sde snod la ma sbyangs pa'i gang zag gi ngo bar
dka' bas| theg pa chen po'i sa lam gyi rim pa shin tu gsal zhing rtogs sla ba| tshig gis ma sgrib pa| gsar bu thos pa chung bas bltas kyang blo la 'char bde ba cig
mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rtsa ba dang sbyar nas gzhung gi go ba longs pa la'ang phan par 'gyur zhing | 'jug pa bde bar bris shig zhes| bsnyen bkur| me tog bzang po dang bcas
te| dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'tsho ba'i rig byed la mkhas pa'i go 'phang thob pa| kun dga' rgyal mtshan gyis snga mo nas yang yang bskul ba las| btang snyoms la re shig
'gyangs par gyur na'ang | shing pho rta'i lo ljon shing dang sa gzhi rnaMs lo 'dab dang | rtswa ljang gi myu gu skyed pa'i dus su bsod snyoms pa rin chen rgyal mtshan dpal
bzang pos yi ger bkod pa 'dis kyang thub pa'i bstan pa dang | sems can la phan bde 'byung par gyur cig| mngon rtogs rgyan gyi rtsa ba thams cad la sbyar ba'i bshad pa byas na'ang
ha cang rgyas pas go dka' ba'i char gyur dgos nas lus rnam bzhag dang sbyar ba yin cing| 'di tsam zhig legs par go na 'grel pa TI ka dang bcas pa bltas pas
shes par 'gyur ba lags so || || × maNG ga laM sid d+hi × shu b+haM|| × dge'o||||
